// 2. Calendly Button Logic const ml = document.getElementById("ml"); const codm = document.getElementById("codm"); const hok = document.getElementById("hok"); const valo = document.getElementById("valo"); const pubg = document.getElementById("pubg"); const lol = document.getElementById("lol"); const calendlyContainer = document.getElementById("calendly-container"); const calendlyInlineWidget = document.getElementById("calendly-inline-widget"); // MobileLeg if (ml && calendlyContainer && calendlyInlineWidget) { ml.addEventListener("click", () => { const calendlyPopup = document.getElementById("popup-calendly"); if (calendlyPopup.classList.contains("hidden")) { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("hidden"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("flex"); // Display as flex (or block) if (!calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized) { Calendly.initInlineWidget({ url: 'https://calendly.com/scrimggs-tournament/scrimggs-tournament', parentElement: calendlyInlineWidget, prefill: {}, utm: {}, }); calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized = "true"; } } else { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("flex"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("hidden"); } }); } else { console.error("Calendly elements are missing."); } // Callodm if (codm && calendlyContainer && calendlyInlineWidget) { codm.addEventListener("click", () => { const calendlyPopup = document.getElementById("popup-calendly"); if (calendlyPopup.classList.contains("hidden")) { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("hidden"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("flex"); // Display as flex (or block) if (!calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized) { Calendly.initInlineWidget({ url: 'https://calendly.com/scrimggs-tournament/scrimggs-codm-tournament', parentElement: calendlyInlineWidget, prefill: {}, utm: {}, }); calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized = "true"; } } else { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("flex"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("hidden"); } }); } else { console.error("Calendly elements are missing."); } // honor of kings if (hok && calendlyContainer && calendlyInlineWidget) { hok.addEventListener("click", () => { const calendlyPopup = document.getElementById("popup-calendly"); if (calendlyPopup.classList.contains("hidden")) { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("hidden"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("flex"); // Display as flex (or block) if (!calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized) { Calendly.initInlineWidget({ url: 'https://calendly.com/otpappointment/healthhaven-otp-appointment', parentElement: calendlyInlineWidget, prefill: {}, utm: {}, }); calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized = "true"; } } else { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("flex"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("hidden"); } }); } else { console.error("Calendly elements are missing."); } // valorant if (valo && calendlyContainer && calendlyInlineWidget) { valo.addEventListener("click", () => { const calendlyPopup = document.getElementById("popup-calendly"); if (calendlyPopup.classList.contains("hidden")) { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("hidden"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("flex"); // Display as flex (or block) if (!calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized) { Calendly.initInlineWidget({ url: 'https://calendly.com/otpappointment/healthhaven-otp-appointment', parentElement: calendlyInlineWidget, prefill: {}, utm: {}, }); calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized = "true"; } } else { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("flex"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("hidden"); } }); } else { console.error("Calendly elements are missing."); } // PUBG if (pubg && calendlyContainer && calendlyInlineWidget) { pubg.addEventListener("click", () => { const calendlyPopup = document.getElementById("popup-calendly"); if (calendlyPopup.classList.contains("hidden")) { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("hidden"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("flex"); // Display as flex (or block) if (!calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized) { Calendly.initInlineWidget({ url: 'https://calendly.com/otpappointment/healthhaven-otp-appointment', parentElement: calendlyInlineWidget, prefill: {}, utm: {}, }); calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized = "true"; } } else { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("flex"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("hidden"); } }); } else { console.error("Calendly elements are missing."); } // League if (lol && calendlyContainer && calendlyInlineWidget) { lol.addEventListener("click", () => { const calendlyPopup = document.getElementById("popup-calendly"); if (calendlyPopup.classList.contains("hidden")) { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("hidden"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("flex"); // Display as flex (or block) if (!calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized) { Calendly.initInlineWidget({ url: 'https://calendly.com/otpappointment/healthhaven-otp-appointment', parentElement: calendlyInlineWidget, prefill: {}, utm: {}, }); calendlyContainer.dataset.initialized = "true"; } } else { calendlyPopup.classList.remove("flex"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("hidden"); } }); } else { console.error("Calendly elements are missing."); } // Close Calendly popup const closeCalendlyPopup = document.getElementById("close-calendly"); closeCalendlyPopup.addEventListener("click", () => { const calendlyPopup = document.getElementById("popup-calendly"); calendlyPopup.classList.add("hidden"); calendlyPopup.classList.remove("flex"); });
